channel.title: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.
channel.description: so there's been many reports of problems with the new mac release update over on the HL2.net forums ([url]https://www.halflife2.net/forums/showthread.php?p=3156416#post3156416[/url]) namely graphical in the games themselves, especially broken skyboxes, lack of promised HDR and lighting issues. this thread is specifically for anyone who wishes to complain and seek help (although valve will eventualy sort them out hopefully). I personally have so far had severe skybox and lighting issues in black mesa east and I'm sure more is yet to come. If soemone reminds me how to post screens without using an image hosting website so I can show what I'm talking about I'd be very grateful.

item.title: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
yeah most of us have had the issue of breen’s animations not working.

Read full topic
item.source: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.

item.title: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
I’m not experiencing any graphical issues at all (PC) and the game looks better with HDR and phong-shading. The only bugs I’ve seen are that the Vortigaunt in Route Kanal doesn’t charge your suit and Breen doesn’t stand up when you teliport into his office in Red Letter Day.

Otherwise, a good update IMO.

Read full topic

item.title: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Magenta’]rot fodder is right, Valve is cool, they’ll get the bugs out. But I also found the bug when running along the steam pipes, finding a little pink square on the wall by the cache . Then right after coming out of Ravenholm (along the railroad tracks) everything turned black, and all you could see was a gray outline of objects. I didn’t save, but got out of the game and when I went back in, everything was okay.

Read full topic

blackout:

we has reason to winge and whine! valve are supposed to be delivering good quality gameplay to us and instead this patch is infested with bugs!

Regardless of that, it’s a pretty pointless thing to do.
Now actually trying to do something about it is a different story.

item.title: concerning issues with the recent and very buggy, otherwise awsome, update.
item.dc:creator: Wasad
item.description:
I noticed a very small bug in the chaper “Route Kanal”. I got to the long pipe where some steam comes out. There is a corner with some barnacles and you have to walk over this pipe. But in this corner i’m having a tiny pink, maybe missing Texture on the wall.

It confused me because i dont know what was there before the update. Maybe its unimportant, but first i thought that something is wrong with my texture files.
